tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE course_content (
  course_id INT,
  course_name VARCHAR(255),
  video_url VARCHAR(255),
  pdf_url VARCHAR(255),
  interactive_modules JSON,
  PRIMARY KEY (course_id)
);

CREATE TABLE courses (
  course_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  course_name VARCHAR(255),
  course_description TEXT,
  course_video_url TEXT,
  course_pdf_url TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE modules (
  module_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  module_name VARCHAR(255),
  module_content TEXT,
  module_type VARCHAR(50),
  module_course_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (module_course_id) REFERENCES courses(course_id)
);
CREATE TABLE course_materials (course_id INT, title STRING, type STRING, content BLOB, PRIMARY KEY (course_id));
CREATE TABLE videos (video_id INT, course_id INT, title STRING, video_url STRING, PRIMARY KEY (video_id), FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES course_materials(course_id));
CREATE TABLE pdfs (pdf_id INT, course_id INT, title STRING, pdf_content BLOB, PRIMARY KEY (pdf_id), FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES course_materials(course_id));
CREATE TABLE modules (module_id INT, course_id INT, title STRING, content STRING, PRIMARY KEY (module_id), FOREIGN KEY (course_id) REFERENCES course_materials(course_id));
CREATE TABLE quizzes (quiz_id INT, module_id INT, question STRING, options STRING[], correct_option STRING, PRIMARY KEY (quiz_id), FOREIGN KEY (module_id) REFERENCES modules(module_id));
